Sentencas: Trivalent cation-doped barium cerate perovskites are attractive materials for clean-energy applications, in particular solid oxide fuel cells, due to their singular proton conductivity in wet environments.
Titulo: Effect of ytterbium doping on the microstructure and plastic deformation of BaCeO3 perovskite oxide

Sentencas: Furthermore, these devices operate at high temperatures, where creep and other deformation processes determine the lifetime and overall performance.
Titulo: Effect of ytterbium doping on the microstructure and plastic deformation of BaCeO3 perovskite oxide

Sentencas: In this work, the structural and microstructural characteristics of undoped and ytterbium-doped (1 to 10 at.%) BaCeO3 polycrystals produced by solid state reaction have been investigated.
Titulo: Effect of ytterbium doping on the microstructure and plastic deformation of BaCeO3 perovskite oxide

Sentencas: A single orthorhombic perovskite phase was found after sintering in air at 1500 degrees C for 10 h. The microstructure shows a complex evolution with doping: the average grain size firstly decreases with increasing Yb content up to 5 at.%, and then increases with further Yb additions.
Titulo: Effect of ytterbium doping on the microstructure and plastic deformation of BaCeO3 perovskite oxide

Sentencas: The high-temperature mechanical properties have been studied in compression between 1100 and 1250 degrees C in air at constant initial strain rate.
Titulo: Effect of ytterbium doping on the microstructure and plastic deformation of BaCeO3 perovskite oxide

Sentencas: The creep strength increases with increasing Yb content.
Titulo: Effect of ytterbium doping on the microstructure and plastic deformation of BaCeO3 perovskite oxide

Sentencas: Extended steady states of deformation were attained at lower strain rates and higher temperatures when increasing doping amount.
Titulo: Effect of ytterbium doping on the microstructure and plastic deformation of BaCeO3 perovskite oxide
